Contains all inforamtion about user: users info, account, plan, user's files etc. Use like facade which provides user's data. !TODO: lazy loading. More...

Detailed Description

Contains all inforamtion about user: users info, account, plan, user's files etc. Use like facade which provides user's data. !TODO: lazy loading.
